long_description: Perfect for afternoons floating downriver or kayaking across the lake, the Extrasport Volksvest PFD offers lightweight, comfortable flotation. Soft, breathable quick-drying nylon is comfortable against skin. Flotation foam is soft and flexible to ensure comfortable range of motion. Front-zip design allows easy on/off; elastic waist and large armholes improve comfort. Adjustable webbing adjustments on the sides ensure a secure fit. Overstock.
short_description: Perfect for afternoons floating downriver or kayaking across the lake, the Extrasport Volksvest PFD offers lightweight, comfortable flotation.
